messages.title: A strong voice for Banff & Buchan
messages.content: I will work to put Banff & Buchan back at the heart of a strong United Kingdom. The Union is our strength and our future. I will strive to keep Banff & Buchan at the forefront of a growing UK economy, reaping the Union benefit - for all our benefit. I will fight to bring Banff & Buchan back onto the Scottish agenda. The Nationalists have taken us for granted. We need a stronger voice to make our case.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work to put Banff & Buchan back at the heart of a strong United Kingdom.
Aim to keep Banff & Buchan at the forefront of a growing UK economy, maximizing the benefits of the Union.
Fight to bring Banff & Buchan back onto the Scottish agenda, asserting that Nationalists have taken the area for granted.

issues.economy: Aim to keep Banff & Buchan at the forefront of a growing UK economy.
issues.governance: Fight to bring Banff & Buchan back onto the Scottish agenda, addressing the neglect by Nationalists.

images.caption: Images of Alex Johnstone with various people, including one in front of an SGM Manufacturing sign.
